attributes.action: Make companies to recruit those who are unemployed over those with a job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am unemployed at the moment and I find it bizarre that companies are recruiting people that already have a job over those without a job. For starters, many unemployed workers can start straight away. Whereas if they decide to employ someone already with a job, then they having to wait the new employee's notice period before the new employee can work for them

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
